meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dawn Volmert Semret Lemma Arthur Chu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6785.

td.p: Dawn Volmert, a controller from Troy, Missouri
Semret Lemma, an MBA student from Arlington, Virginia
Arthur Chu, a compliance analyst and voiceover artist from Broadview Heights, Ohio (whose 8-day cash winnings total $238,200)

tr.td: CELEBRITY VETERANS
THE COOKIE AISLE
STATE BY COUNTIES
ACTUAL 911 CALLS
RUSSIAN TO JUDGMENT
LEADER OF THE "PACK"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_2', 'clue_J_1_2_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew delivers the clue from the Pima Air & Space Museum in Tucson, AZ.) ArthurWhat is -gate?
$400
-gate')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
